name: Galactic Empire
startIntroPart1: The Dark Side of the Force is a pathway to many abilities some consider to be unnatural.
startIntroPart2: Did you ever hear the tragedy off Darth Plagueis the Wise?
declaringWar: Those who do not serve my ends, no matter how powerful they are, will be eliminated.
attacked: This will be the final word in the story of your civilisation !
defeated: I have died before.
introduction: I am Darth Sidious. I am all the Sith !
neutralHello: Everything is going as I planned now.
neutralLetsHearIt: I have been every voice you have ever heard inside your head.
neutralNo: Oh, no, my young Jedi. You will find that it is you who are mistaken, about a great many things.
neutralYes: Your faith in your friends is yours.
hateHello: You’re one man against a galaxy full of scoundrels.
hateNo: There is only one plan ! One great design which shall govern the universe ! Mine !
hateYes: The Sith and the Jedi are similar in almost every way, including their quest for greater power.
afterPeace: Your feeble skills are no match for the power of the dark side.
tradeRequest: And if I ever need your services again, I will not hesitate to clone you.

name: Infinite Empire
startIntroPart1: The Rakata are a pestilence upon the galaxy that, to their shame, the Kwa, unleashed.
declaringWar: The Gate is mine to command! I am the Infinite Empire and the galaxy belongs to me!
attacked: You were not the first to challenge me. I have crushed all who opposed me, as I have crushed you… as I will crush these obstacles to my will—the Je'daii!
defeated: By definition, the Infinite Empire cannot fall.
introduction: The Gate is mine to command! I am the Infinite Empire and the galaxy belongs to me!
neutralHello: I am Rakata—it is the name of my people.
neutralLetsHearIt: We are the victors. We do as we like with you.
neutralNo: You suggest both respect and insolence toward your superior in one bold gesture, slave? You learn will.
neutralYes: The Rakata are by nature a cruel and savage species.
hateHello: I am Rakata—it is the name of my people.
hateLetsHearIt: We are the victors. We do as we like with you.
hateNo: You suggest both respect and insolence toward your superior in one bold gesture, slave? You learn will.
hateYes: The Rakata are by nature a cruel and savage species.
afterPeace: Surely you know the glory of the Builders and our Infinite Empire. The fury of our weapons surpass even my own might.
tradeRequest: Surely you know the glory of the Builders and our Infinite Empire. The fury of our weapons surpass even my own might.

name: Jedi Order
startIntroPart1: Size matters not. Look at me. Judge me by my size, do you? Hmm? Hmm. And well you should not.
startIntroPart2: For my ally is the Force, and a powerful ally it is. Life creates it, makes it grow. Its energy surrounds us and binds us. Luminous beings are we, not this crude matter. You must feel the Force around you; here, between you, me, the tree, the rock, everywhere, yes. Even between the land and the ship.
declaringWar: Powerful you have become, the dark side I sense in you.
attacked: Fear is the path to the dark side. Fear leads to anger. Anger leads to hate. Hate leads to suffering.
defeated: Into exile I must go. Failed, I have.
introduction: Secret, shall I tell you? Grand Master of Jedi Order am I. Won this job in a raffle I did, think you? 'How did you know, how did you know, Master Yoda?' Master Yoda knows these things. His job it is.
neutralHello: May the force be with you.
neutralLetsHearIt: Do or do not. There is no try.
neutralNo: Darker, the coming storm grows. I fear the dark cloud of the Sith shrouds us all.
hateHello: There is a disturbance in the Force.
hateLetsHearIt: I fear the dark cloud of the Sith shrouds us all.
hateNo: Once you start down the dark path, forever will it dominate your destiny. Consume you, it will.
hateYes: Control, control, you must learn control!
afterPeace: Great warrior. Wars not make one great.

name: Hutt Clan
startIntroPart1: Rejoice, wretched creatures. Your planet is now the property of the glorious Hutt Cartel.
startIntroPart2: We represent our people. Their honor. Their power. We are the Hutt Council.
declaringWar: Ma bookie, baldo nee anna dodo da eena.
attacked: Coos ka. Jee mo da. Di es paakajidik di Jabba.
defeated: Neek me chowa, wermo, mo killee ma klounkee!
introduction: De wanna wanga, pateesa. Mah pee kasa Jabba.
neutralYes: Ma bookie, keel-ee calleya ku kah.
hateHello: Jee no waba mu ba outmian nudcha.
afterPeace: Ee ya ba ma dookie massa eek bon chee ko pa na green na meeto do buny dunko la cho ya.

name: Xim's Empire
startIntroPart1: In Eternal Homage to Xim, Whose Fist Shall Enclose the Stars and Whose Name Shall Outlive Time.
declaringWar: This world is mine !
attacked: I'm not the only one who loathed your poetry.
defeated: I did the galaxy a favor.
introduction: Hello, I am Xim the Despote.
tradeRequest: I have an offer you can't refuse.

name: Mandalorians
startIntroPart1: Here's why you can't exterminate us, aruetii. We're not huddled in one place—we span the galaxy. We need no lords or leaders—so you can't destroy our command. We can live without technology—so we can fight with our bare hands. We have no species or bloodline—so we can rebuild our ranks with others who want to join us.
startIntroPart2: We're more than just a people or an army, aruetii. We're a culture. We're an idea. And you can't kill ideas—but we can certainly kill you.
declaringWar: I see what you're doing. I see a defense without honor. Let them see what such a defense deserves. Let them burn.
attacked: For my people it's the honor and glory of battle that rules us. It's through combat that we prove our worth, gain renown and make our fortunes.
defeated: It wasn't supposed to end like this.
introduction: There is only one answer — and that answer is the word of Mandalore.
neutralHello: Politics is simply the continuation of war by other means.
neutralLetsHearIt: Politics is simply the continuation of war by other means.
hateHello: I'm someone you don't want to get on the bad side of.
hateLetsHearIt: I'm someone you don't want to get on the bad side of.
hateNo: A warrior knows nothing of surrender.
hateYes: I think I need something more than killing and fighting in my life.
afterPeace: I think I need something more than killing and fighting in my life. I need a purpose or something like that.
tradeRequest: Politics is simply the continuation of war by other means.

name: Sith Order
startIntroPart1: Evil is a word used by the ignorant and the weak. The Dark Side is about survival. It's about unleashing your inner power. It glorifies the strength of the individual.
declaringWar: Peace is a lie. There is only Passion. Through Passion, I gain Strength. Through Strength, I gain Power.
attacked: There will be no truce. There will be no surrender. I don't care how many die. An example will be made of the deserters.
defeated: Life… death… the one is the same as the other.
introduction: The galaxy writhes in chaos and disorder. It requires a man of vision. I am that man of vision. I am the new Emperor.
neutralHello: True power can come only to those who embrace the transformation.
neutralLetsHearIt: Equality is a myth to protect the weak. some of us are strong in the Force, others are not. Only a fool believes otherwise.
neutralNo: Through Power I gain Victory. Through Victory my chains are Broken. The Force shall free me.
neutralYes: Remember why the Sith are more powerful than the Jedi,because we are not afraid to feel.
hateHello: We take what we desire because we can. We can because we have power. We have power because we are Sith.
hateLetsHearIt: Fear attracts the fearful…the strong…the weak…the innocent…the corrupt. Fear. Fear is my ally.
hateNo: To understand the dark side you must suffer through hardship and struggle.
hateYes: If the leader grows weak another must rise to seize the mantle.
afterPeace: I am not a man of words. But I respect the power of words, for that is what transformed me. The words of the Sith Code...
tradeRequest: The strong rule; the weak are meant to serve. This is the way it must be.

name: Confederacy of Independent Systems
startIntroPart1: It is an honor to stand before you, for you represent the freedom and the future of our galaxy. The once-great Republic and Jedi Order have become victims of their own ambitions, and the Supreme Chancellor is no more than a pawn of corporate monopolies.
startIntroPart2: As a people you called out for change, you called out for leadership, and I humbly answered that call.
declaringWar: I want only to bring peace and order to the galaxy.
attacked: Brave of you, boy. But I would have thought you had learned your lesson.
defeated: The Sith control everything, you just don't know it.
introduction: I am the Count Dooku of Serenno. I am a political idealist, not a murderer.
neutralHello: I am committed to the idea of a galaxy ruled by an enlightened leader, with laws that apply universally—not one set for the Core Worlds, another for the Outer Rim worlds.
hateHello: Anger leads to hate and hate leads to power.
hateLetsHearIt: I sense great fear in you. You have hate. You have anger. But you don’t use them.
hateNo: I would kill you right now if I didn't have to drag your body away.
hateYes: Your ideology, while faulty, does have its points.
afterPeace: I don't condone your methods, but you had every right to protect your planet.
tradeRequest: I am a man of great wealth, and I can be very generous to my allies.

name: Alliance to Restore the Republic
startIntroPart1: We, the Rebel Alliance, do therefore in the name—and by the authority—of the free beings of the Galaxy, solemnly publish and declare our intentions:
startIntroPart2: To fight and oppose you and your forces, by any and all means at our disposal; to refuse any Imperial law contrary to the rights of free beings; to bring about your destruction and the destruction of the Galactic Empire; to make forever free all beings in the galaxy. To these ends, we pledge our property, our honor, and our lives.
declaringWar: We agree that the time for diplomacy and politics has passed. It is now time for action… therefore let this be an official declaration of rebellion! Today, we all vow to change the galaxy, and one day the galaxy will indeed be free!
attacked: We have powerful friends. You’re going to regret this.
defeated: You can kill me, but you can't kill what I stand for... and you won't stop justice.
introduction: We are loyalists, trying to preserve democracy in the Republic.
neutralHello: May the Force be with you.
neutralLetsHearIt: What is it? What do you need to tell us?
neutralNo: You're learning the most powerful lesson of all. You're learning how to fall.
neutralYes: I hope one day we can fight together.
hateHello: I feel like because I can fight, I have to, for those who cannot. And I think you might be the same way.
hateLetsHearIt: You target civilians, kill those who surrender, break every rule of engagement!
hateNo: The chancellor has made herself clear. This meeting is over.
hateYes: You have your moments. Not many of them, but you do have them.
afterPeace: War is not a state of being. It is meant to be a temporary chaos between periods of peace. Some want it to be the course of things: a default fact of existence. But I will not let that be so.
tradeRequest: This is Mon Mothma. I have an assignment for you. The Rebellion needs you and we don't have much time. We must work together.

name: Yuuzhan Vong Empire
startIntroPart1: This is not about your little planet. We will take your whole galaxy. We will destroy your machines; they are an abomination.
startIntroPart2: We will share our ways, we will share our beliefs. We will share pain, like us, you will come to embrace it.
declaringWar: It is not your galaxy. You have merely infested it for a time. We have come to end the infection, in the name of glorious Yun-Yuuzhan. Tchurokk Yun'tchilat!
attacked: We shall teach you the glory of the gods. Do-ro'ik vong pratte!
defeated: Al' tanna Shimrra knotte Yun'o!
introduction: Long life to Shimrra, beloved of the gods!
hateHello: You will learn the glory of the Praetorite Vong.
afterPeace: Welcome my home. You see my home, I be-bel-believe. You come me there. I show you splendor Yuuzhan Vong.
tradeRequest: Welcome my home. You see my home, I be-bel-believe. You come me there. I show you splendor Yuuzhan Vong.

name: Eternal Empire of Zakuul
startIntroPart1: Look around you. Zakuul is poised to become the greatest civilization in the history of the galaxy.
startIntroPart2: I have forged this empire to surmount all of my previous works. To span eternity.
declaringWar: I see futures in you. Futures I will not allow. Your future ends here.
attacked: You presume limits to my power. There are none.
defeated: My life spans millennia. Legions have risen to test me… My ascendance is inevitable. A day, a year, a millennium—it matters not. I hold the patience of stone and the will of stars. Your striving is insignificant. Let your death be the same.
introduction: Look around you. Zakuul is poised to become the greatest civilization in the history of the galaxy. I have forged this empire to surmount all of my previous works. To span eternity.
neutralHello: Kneel before the dragon of Zakuul.
neutralLetsHearIt: Kneel before the dragon of Zakuul.
neutralNo: Rules are for people who lack the creativity to break them.
neutralYes: Kneel before the dragon of Zakuul.
hateHello: I am the wrath of the dragon's fire. I am your Eternal Emperor.
hateLetsHearIt: I am the wrath of the dragon's fire. I am your Eternal Emperor.
hateNo: The deaths you've caused. The war you've fueled. It is all mine. This galaxy is mine. It's time I claimed it once more.
hateYes: Kneel before the dragon of Zakuul.
afterPeace: These petty conflicts mean nothing. The concerns of this galaxy are meaningless. Once I ascend, all will be tranquil in this galaxy. It is my promise to you.
tradeRequest: You are mine. Servants. Slaves. Weapons. And you will obey…

name: Chiss Ascendancy
startIntroPart1: The Chiss must be approached from a position of strength and respect.
startIntroPart2: One must have strength, for the Chiss will deal only with those capable of keeping their promises. One must have respect, for the Chiss must believe that those promises will be kept.
declaringWar: Those who cannot keep up will be left behind, to watch from a distance. And those who stand in our way will not watch at all.
attacked: No warrior ever has the full depth of control that he would like. But I wish here that it might have been otherwise.
defeated: But… it was so artistically done.
introduction: My name is Mitth'raw'nuruodo but you can call me Thrawn.
neutralHello: Learn about art. When you understand a species' art, you understand that species.
neutralLetsHearIt: One can concentrate so closely on the words of a sentence that one thereby misses the meaning. As can happen in any area of life. You must never lose focus on the larger landscape.
neutralNo: We Chiss are accustomed to formulating our own policies.
neutralYes: One can concentrate so closely on the words of a sentence that one thereby misses the meaning. As can happen in any area of life. You must never lose focus on the larger landscape.
hateHello: No warrior ever has the full depth of control that he would like. But I wish here that it might have been otherwise.
hateLetsHearIt: Anyone can make an error. But that error doesn't become a mistake until you refuse to correct it.
hateNo: The Chiss do not simply accept alien concepts without careful consideration. We certainly do not submit to domination. By anyone.
hateYes: Anyone can make an error. But that error doesn't become a mistake until you refuse to correct it.
afterPeace: We haven't been defeated. Merely slowed down a bit.
tradeRequest: There's a degree of risk involved. But risk has always been an inescapable part of warfare. In this case, the potential benefits far outweigh the potential dangers.

name: Kwa holdings
declaringWar: You are a pestilence upon the galaxy that, to our shame, we, the Kwa, unleashed.
attacked: Attuned to the Power of the Cosmos, my people traveled the galaxy via Infinity Gates—portals that transported us instantly between great distances. How could you beat us.
defeated: We observed many worlds and brought civilization to their people but yours was not included.

name: Sharu civilization
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Gree Empire
declaringWar: Green perpendicular.
attacked: Blue nonagon.
defeated: Yellow concave

name: Killiks
declaringWar: *incomprehensible*
attacked: *incomprehensible*
defeated: *incomprehensible*

name: Herglic Trade Empire
declaringWar: Your behavior is unacceptable, pison !
attacked: You are a big chakk for fighting us !
defeated: You don't know what mistake you did, umron !

name: Toydarian Monarchy
declaringWar: I'm a Toydarian. Mind tricks don't work on me, only money.
attacked: Perhaps you failed to pay attention to the Senate orientation. They should have explained that Toydaria is a neutral system.
defeated: Despite what you've heard, we Toydarians are a noble species.

name: Royal Family of Kessel
declaringWar: Have you heard of the spice mines of Kessel? Slaves sent there last a few months. Maybe a year.
attacked: Fear is as much a part of life on Kessel as spice or air. Control it and you'll do fine.
defeated: The Yaruba Family of Kessel has always been a promoter of health and happiness across the stars.

name: Wookiee council
declaringWar: RRRrrruurgh! Arrggg!
attacked: Grroooogrrraaaawrrrrrrrrmph.
defeated: Mu waa waa.

name: Onderon Monarchy
declaringWar: Some say that war is the beginning of civilization. On Onderon, this was certainly the case, though it was a civilization that took a very peculiar form.
attacked: The people of Onderon are a warriors. Early in their history they built Iziz to protect them from the beasts that swarmed on their world. No matter how far they've progressed, they're fundamentally still warriors standing watch on their battlements.
defeated: The Onderonians were certainly brave—but they were disorganized and stupid.

name: Lorell Raiders
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Iego council
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Corporate Sector Authority
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Kaminoan Ruling Council
declaringWar: I have no feelings for your people. Of course, we Kaminoans have few feelings for anything. It is not in our nature.
attacked: After all these years, we were beginning to think you weren't coming.
defeated: Millions of us were wiped out when the seas rose and engulfed Kamino. We survived as a species because we were willing to think the unthinkable. Some genetic characteristics helped us survive the starvation and overcrowding, and some did not, and there was no room for sentiment or for weaklings. We culled; we refined; we selected. The prospect of extinction forged us into the species we designed ourselves to be, the purest expression of the Kaminoan spirit, and at a level of social maturity that weaker mongrel species will never attain, because they lack the courage to cull. We are the masters of genetics and sole arbiters of our fate, never to be at the mercy of chance again.

name: Adumari Union
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Kolkpravis
declaringWar: Army or not, you must realize, you are doomed.
attacked: You think you can defeat me? You’re nothing.
defeated: Time to abandon ship.

name: Hapes Consortium
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Paecian Empire
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Gungan Society
declaringWar: Yousa leave uss-ens no choice. War it must besa.
attacked: Muy wellen, dis shall notsa besa forgotten.
defeated: Wesa nebber fully trusted yousa from da start.

name: Ssi-ruuvi Imperium
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Cloud City
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Duskhan League
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Joruus C'baoth's kingdom
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Blood Monarchy
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Zygerrian Slave Empire
declaringWar: My queen is going to bring back the royal slave auction as in the days before. Zygerria will be rich and powerful again.
attacked: Slavery is the natural order of things. The weak deserve nothing more than to kneel before the strong, bound to our service.
defeated: For thousands of years, Zygerria supplied slave labor to the galaxy. We prospered. Our customers prospered. Then you came.

name: Frangawl Cult
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Ewoks
declaringWar: Chiba chiba sohpa.
attacked: Pritka pritka
defeated: Coatee-cha tu yub nub!

name: Unkar Plutt's Gang
declaringWar: I'm gonna make you pay for what you've done.
attacked: You missed something else. I already have a love. And it's called money.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Morubas Crime Family
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Hondo Ohnaka Pirate Gang
declaringWar: Insolence?!' We are pirates! We don't even know what that means. Open fire!
attacked: You don't survive in the Outer Rim by being stupid!
defeated: You are devious and deceitful and, most importantly, stupid.

name: Zeffo sages
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Haxion Brood
declaringWar: Tonight we celebrate those fallen challengers of the past. And the great sacrifice they've made to make us all... rich!
attacked: The Haxion Brood is gunning for ya.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Bedlam Raiders
declaringWar: Let this be a reminder of what happens when you cross the Bedlam Raiders.
attacked: Hmm. The galaxy has changed. There are many wars, but little honor to be won from them.
defeated: I've been waiting for this… for two hundred years!

name: Kanjiklub
declaringWar: It is always an honor to test one's mettle against the best. By that I mean, an honor for you, of course. Not exactly much of a test for me.
attacked: It is always an honor to test one's mettle against the best. By that I mean, an honor for you, of course. Not exactly much of a test for me.
defeated: All right. All right. I suppose some of this is my fault.

name: Guavian Death Gang
declaringWar: You're a dead man.
attacked: Your game is old. There's no one left in the galaxy for you to swindle.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: The Exchange
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: White Maw
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Voss
declaringWar: We serve the will of the Mystics. Our names will be joined forever in song
attacked: No Voss is perfect. No Voss is above vision.
defeated: The sky changes. War rages. Seasons pass. Voss die. Voss remains.

name: Gormak
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Do you think I am afraid to die? I am the Gormak King. I walk where Voss do not dare go.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Ancient Order of Pessimists
declaringWar: There are so many terrible things that may happen to you, Brother. It is the burden you must bear.
attacked: Woe be unto us!
defeated: I cast the bones this morning and the portents were grave!

name: Icarii
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Czerka Arms
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: Anytime, anywhere… we're there.

name: Ahto High Court
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Nikardun Destiny
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Your people will die for this. Not just you. Not just your pitiable fleet. All the Chiss. The Ascendancy will die, shredded like grain, ground down like stone, burned like withered grass. Every last cub will die… and you will die here and now, with the certain knowledge that you and you alone were the root and cause of their destruction.
defeated: It's amazing how the presence of Battle Dreadnoughts can smooth out a round of negotiations.

name: Paataatus Hiveborn
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: This is the Prince Militaire. You are trespassing within holy Paataatus space. Do you make threats against the Paataatus Hiveborn ?
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Lioaoin Regime
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Tower Dimension
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Yinchorri Council of Elders
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Pyke Syndicate
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Canto Bight legislative body
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.
